title: Convert Seconds to TIME
description:
SECOND_TO_TIME calculates a value (TIME) from the input
value in seconds as a REAL.
name: SECOND_TO_TIME

input.name: IN
input.description: The input value representing time in seconds that needs to be converted to TIME.

output.name: SECOND_TO_TIME
output.description: The output time value converted from the input seconds into the TIME format.
